lead_paragraph: BLOM--Marybeth McCloskey, of Bronxville, NY, died on February 23, 2016, after a courageous battle with Glioblastoma Multiforme. Beloved wife of Henry A. Blom, loving mother of Ian, Kaia and Lara. Dear daughter of Robert and Florence McCloskey. Sister of Robert, Ann, Kate and the late Jim. Marybeth attended Keene State College in New Hampshire. Calling hours at the Fred H. McGrath & Son, Funeral Home, Bronxville, between the hours of 2-4pm and 6-9pm Friday. Funeral service at Christ Church Bronxville, on Saturday, February 27 at 2pm. In lieu of flowers, contributions may be made in Marybeth's memory to Young at Arts of Christ Church Bronxville, 17 Sagamore Road, Bronxville, NY 10708. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  BLOM, MARYBETH MCCLOSKEY
